body_html:
The Java side of the Android interface with TensorFlow was moved to tensorflow/contrib/android/java. If you add that as an additional srcs directory it should work for you.

build.gradle should probably be updated to include this automatically.
body_text:
The Java side of the Android interface with TensorFlow was moved to tensorflow/contrib/android/java. If you add that as an additional srcs directory it should work for you.
build.gradle should probably be updated to include this automatically.
body:
The Java side of the Android interface with TensorFlow was moved to `tensorflow/contrib/android/java`. If you add that as an additional srcs directory it should work for you.

[build.gradle](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/build.gradle) should probably be updated to include this automatically.
